verses.roman:
dvāre tulasī lepā-piṇḍira upara
goṅphāra śobhā dekhi' lokera juḍāya antara

synonyms: dvāre—at the door; tulasī—the tulasī plant; lepā—very clean; piṇḍira upara—on the altar; goṅphāra śobhā—the beauty of the cave; dekhi'-seeing; lokera—of everyone; juḍāya—was satisfied; antara—the heart.
translation: Thus everyone who saw the beauty of the cave, with the tulasī plant on a clean altar, was astonished and satisfied at heart.
